text: Francisco Benitez (born March 26, 1962 in Madrid) is a swimmer from Spain. He had a disability and is an S6 type swimmer. He raced at the 1972 Summer Paralympics. He came in second in two different swimming races. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:1972 Summer Paralympics
title: Francisco Benitez
